q_en: What is the material with the lowest remaining inventory?
gt:
Sure thing! Based on the latest data, the material with the lowest remaining inventory is:

| Material ID | Material Name |
|-------------|---------------|
| 5           | Silk          |

Looks like Silk is running low in stock! ðŸ§µâœ¨ If you need more information or have any other questions, feel free to ask! ðŸ˜„

steps.sql: SELECT material_id FROM warehouse_material ORDER BY left_number ASC LIMIT 1;
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID with the lowest remaining inventory from the warehouse_material table

steps.sql: SELECT name FROM materials WHERE id = '5';
steps.description: Retrieve the name of the material with the lowest remaining inventory
